param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: timeline
param.label: Twitter Timeline
param.description: Choose which timeline you want to display.

param.name: count
param.label: Number of tweets
param.description: The number of messages to display in the module.

param.name: show-image
param.label: Show user image
param.description: Display the user image with the message.

param.name: show-username
param.label: Show user name
param.description: Display the user name with the message.

param.name: show-date
param.label: Show date
param.description: Display the date of the message.

param.name: parse-links
param.label: Parse links
param.description: Parse the URLs in messages as links

param.name: enable-cache
param.label: Enable the cache
param.description: Cache the results for faster load times.

param.name: cache-time
param.label: Cache refresh time
param.description: Enter the number of minutes after which to refresh the cache
